line_2: Under this title the most Christian Lords

line_1: "He sleeps i' the aisle, — but not a stone records
line_2: " His name or fame, his actions or his words:

line_1: Far in the East, as Sacred Writ records,
line_2: Dwelt Laban, rich in sundry flocks and herds;

line_1: Contents You not, search ENGLAND's fair records,
line_2: The Tyranny, and Falsehood of those Lords,

line_1: The wampum-belt my growing fame records,
line_2: That tells great actions without help of words.
